channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Judge reverses Trump administration’s cuts of billions of dollars to Harvard University
item.description: A federal judge in Boston has ordered the reversal of the Trump administration’s cuts to more than $2.6 billion in funding for research grants for Harvard University.

item.title: Trump suggests National Guard could go into New Orleans, a blue city in a red state
Epstein survivors implore Congress to act as push for disclosure builds
